game.name: Christmas Gift Sweeper
game.description:
Christmas is just a few days away and you all are set to make this celebration bigger than before! However, before doing that, there is no loss in enjoying the spirit of this biggest celebration of the year by playing a brand new arcade puzzle challenge. Be prepared to match 3 or more of the same colored gift tiles in Christmas Gift Sweeper! Your job is to swap adjacent tiles and make more matching of gift tiles. All the matching tiles will be removed from the board. 

It will be amazing to play with the presents and relax your mind. Put your concentration and matching abilities to the test to clear the board in this fun html5 puzzle challenge! Complete all the levels and show Santa that you are a very talent and hard-working elf of the city! Keep matching until you clear all the gifts from the board to complete each level! This Christmas-themed puzzle includes 7 unique and challenging levels to play through and different presents to enjoy. 

Keep your eyes at the top of the screen to track your progress report! You can also consider this bar as your time period as if it goes to zero, you will be thrown out of the game. Try to clear 3 or more same items either vertically or horizontally to complete all 7 levels with the maximum possible points! Pass each level by filling the bar as fast as you can in this cool Xmas based game! Your present score will be displayed on the bottom of the screen. Check out more fun arcade Christmas games for boys and girls that are free to play online, no download required!

game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE THE SAME IMAGES IN ROW AND COLOUM TO PLAY ,CONNECT AT LEAST 3 IMAGES
game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L CLICK OF MOUSE ANS SWIPE TO MATCH THE SAME IMAGES IN ROW AND COLOMS, MATCH AT LEAST 3 IMAGES
